{d}nanše\dat e₂-an-na-tum₂-me bad₃ lagaš{ki}\gen\abs mu-na-du₃ zu₂\abs mu-na-keše₂ {d}nin-ŋir₂-su₂-ra e₂-an-na-tum₂ ensi₂ lagaš{ki}-ke₄ mu\abs pad₃-da {d}en-lilₓ(E₂)-ke₄ a₂\abs šum₂-ma {d}nin-ŋir₂-su₂-ka-ke₄ šag₄\l3 pad₃-da {d}nanše-ke₄ ga zid\abs gu₇-a {d}nin-hur-saŋ-ka-ke₄ mu dug₃\abs še₂₁-a {d}inana-ka-ke₄ ŋeštug₂\abs šum₂-ma {d}en-ki-ke₄ ki\abs aŋ₂ {d}dumu-zid-abzu-ke₄\gen\erg ŋiškim-til₃ {d}hendur-saŋ-ka-ke₄ dumu aya₂-kur-gal ensi₂ lagaš{ki}-ke₄\gen\gen\erg {d}nin-ŋir₂-su₂-ra ŋir₂-su₂{ki}\abs ki-be₂
5el3 mu-na-gi₄ bad₃ iri-kug-ga\abs mu-na-du₃ {d}nanše\dat niŋin₆{ki}\abs mu-na-du₃ e₂-an-na-tum₂-e elam hur-saŋ u₆-ga
5al2 aga₃-kar₂\abs be₂-seg₁₀\v10l2 |SAHAR.DU₆.TAK₄|-bi\abs mu-dub šu-nir |URU×A|{ki}-ka\gen\l1 ensi₂-bi\abs saŋ-ba\l1 mu-du\l2 aga₃-kar₂\abs be₂-seg₁₀\v10l2 |SAHAR.DU₆.TAK₄|-bi\abs mu-dub umma{ki}\l2 aga₃-kar₂\abs be₂-seg₁₀\v10l2 |SAHAR.DU₆.TAK₄|-bi\abs niš\cop mu-dub {d}nin-ŋir₂-su₂-ra
5ral2 {a-šag₄}ašag ki\abs aŋ₂-ni gu₂-eden-na\abs šu-na
5al2 mu-ni-gi₄ unug{ki}\l2 aga₃-kar₂\abs be₂-seg₁₀\v10l2 urim₅{ki}\l2 aga₃-kar₂\abs be₂-seg₁₀\v10l2 ki-utu-ka
5al2 aga₃-kar₂\abs be₂-seg₁₀\v10l2 iri-az{ki}\abs mu-hul ensi₂-bi\abs mu-uš₂ mi-ši-me{ki}\abs mu-hul a-ru₂-a{ki}\abs mu-ha-lam e₂-an-na-tum₂ mu\abs pad₃-da {d}nin-ŋir₂-su₂-ka-da kur-kur-re₂ saŋ\abs e-dab₆-sag₃ mu lugal akšak{ki}-ka\abs i₃-zig₃-ga-a\v14sg3s e₂-an-na-tum₂ mu\abs pad₃-da {d}nin-ŋir₂-su₂-ka-ke₄ an-ta-sur-ra {d}nin-ŋir₂-su₂-ka-ta akšak{ki}-še₃ mu-gaz mu-ha-lam ud-ba e₂-an-na-tum₂-e id₂ gibil mu-na-dun A x {d}nin-ŋir₂-su₂-ka diŋir-ra-ni {d}šul-|MUŠ×PA|\cop e₂-an-na-tum₂ ensi₂ lagaš{ki}\gen dumu aya₂-kur-gal
